2012-02-29

Davy Jones

My first reaction was "shame" ... it's easy to think that the other Monkees were cooler, and for the most part all my fave songs were sung by other Monkees... but Davy was the most adorable (and he was one of ours too) so as it sunk in I became sadder than I thought I would...

This is adorable - cute Davy auditioning

And this is pretty sweet too - cute Davy in drag

And this is to show just how great they were - cute Davy with maraccas
